products.add: INSERT INTO products (id, name, price, num, specifications, notes) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
products.modify: UPDATE products SET name = ?, price = ?, num = ?, specifications = ?, notes = ? WHERE id = ?;

users.add: INSERT INTO users (id, name, tel, address, notes) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
users.modify: UPDATE users SET name = ?, tel = ?, address = ?, notes = ? WHERE id = ?;

purchaseOrders.add: INSERT INTO purchaseOrders (id, time, state) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
purchaseOrders.modify: UPDATE purchaseOrders SET time = ?, state = ? WHERE id = ?;

purchaseOperations.add: INSERT INTO purchaseOperations (id, purchaseOrderId, productId, num) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);

saleOrders.add: INSERT INTO saleOrders (id, time, state, userId, selling) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
saleOrders.modify: UPDATE saleOrders SET time = ?, state = ?, userId = ?, selling = ? WHERE id = ?;

saleOperations.add: INSERT INTO saleOperations (id, saleOrderId, productId, num) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);

checkOuts.add: INSERT INTO checkOuts (id, saleOrderId, time, amount) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
